Container.Name: tvheadend
Container.Overview: Tvheadend(https://www.tvheadend.org/) works as a proxy server: is a TV streaming server and recorder for Linux, FreeBSD and Android supporting DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-C, DVB-T, ATSC, ISDB-T, IPTV, SATIP and HDHomeRun as input sources. Tvheadend offers the HTTP (VLC, MPlayer), HTSP (Kodi, Movian) and SATIP streaming. Multiple EPG sources are supported (over-the-air DVB and ATSC including OpenTV DVB extensions, XMLTV, PyXML).

Config.Name: /dev/dri
Config.Description: Only needed if you want to use your AMD/Intel GPU for hardware accelerated video encoding (vaapi).

Config.Name: /dev/dvb
Config.Description: Only needed if you want to pass through a DVB card to the container. If you use IPTV or HDHomeRun you can leave it out.
